response.overview: Fashion designer Hed Mayner’s Autumn/Winter 2025 menswear, presented during Paris Fashion Week, heralds a bold transformation and experimental new chapter in his vision. Oversized tailoring becomes dynamic—high shoulders collapse, curved sleeves drape, and trousers cinch at the waist with chains to create fluid, shapeshifting silhouettes. Vintage fabrics—flock-denim, washed leather, plaid knits—are deconstructed and reassembled into sweeping, tactile forms that balance raw gesture with refined technique.
response.title: HED MAYNER AUTUMN/WINTER 2025
